sys_openapi_operation.name: Gets the places that lie within a geographic region. The geographic region of interest can either be specified by using a lat/lon geo-point and a radius in metres to return places within the locus defined by the lat/lon of its centre or alternatively, by the use of a bounding box defined by the lat/lon of its north-west and south-east corners. Optionally filters on type and can strip properties for a smaller payload.

openapi.display_value: Transport for London Unified API - v1
